  <script>
    // Enhanced Prime Spiral Visualization with hover detection
    class PrimeSpiralVisualizer {
      constructor() {
        this.initializeElements();
        this.initializeState();
        this.setupEventListeners();
        this.initializeView();
      }

      initializeElements() {
        this.canvas = document.getElementById('canvas');
        this.tooltip = document.getElementById('tooltip');
        this.performanceInfo = document.getElementById('performanceInfo');
        
        // Control elements
        this.ulamBtn = document.getElementById('ulamBtn');
        this.sacksBtn = document.getElementById('sacksBtn');
        this.archimedesBtn = document.getElementById('archimedesBtn');
        this.generateBtn = document.getElementById('generateBtn');
        this.resetViewBtn = document.getElementById('resetViewBtn');
        this.rangeSlider = document.getElementById('rangeSlider');
        this.dotSizeSlider = document.getElementById('dotSizeSlider');
        
        // Display elements
        this.rangeLabel = document.getElementById('rangeLabel');
        this.dotSizeLabel = document.getElementById('dotSizeLabel');
        this.currentRange = document.getElementById('currentRange');
        this.primeCount = document.getElementById('primeCount');
        this.primeDensity = document.getElementById('primeDensity');
        this.zoomLevel = document.getElementById('zoomLevel');
      }

      initializeState() {
        this.ctx = null;
        this.spiralType = 'ulam';
        this.primes = new Set();
        this.spiralPoints = [];
        this.visiblePoints = []; // Cache for visible points (performance optimization)
    
    // View parameters
        this.offsetX = 0;
        this.offsetY = 0;
        this.zoom = 1;
        this.dragging = false;
        this.lastMouseX = 0;
        this.lastMouseY = 0;
        
        // Performance tracking
        this.lastFrameTime = 0;
        this.frameCount = 0;
        
        // Hover detection
        this.hoveredPoint = null;
        this.spatialGrid = new Map(); // For efficient hover detection
      }

      resizeCanvas() {
      const ratio = Math.max(1, Math.floor(window.devicePixelRatio || 1));
        const rect = this.canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
        this.canvas.width = rect.width * ratio;
        this.canvas.height = rect.height * ratio;
        this.ctx = this.canvas.getContext('2d');
        this.ctx.scale(ratio, ratio);
        this.ctx.imageSmoothingEnabled = true;
        this.ctx.imageSmoothingQuality = 'high';
      return { width: rect.width, height: rect.height };
    }

      sieveOfEratosthenes(limit) {
      const sieve = new Array(limit + 1).fill(true);
      sieve[0] = sieve[1] = false;
      
      for (let i = 2; i * i <= limit; i++) {
        if (sieve[i]) {
          for (let j = i * i; j <= limit; j += i) {
            sieve[j] = false;
          }
        }
      }
      
      const primeSet = new Set();
      for (let i = 2; i <= limit; i++) {
        if (sieve[i]) primeSet.add(i);
      }
      return primeSet;
    }

      generateUlamSpiral(maxNum) {
      const points = [];
      let x = 0, y = 0;
      let dx = 0, dy = -1;
      let num = 1;
      
      for (let i = 0; i < maxNum; i++) {
        points.push({ x, y, n: num });
        
        if (x === y || (x < 0 && x === -y) || (x > 0 && x === 1 - y)) {
          [dx, dy] = [-dy, dx];
        }
        
        x += dx;
        y += dy;
        num++;
      }
      
      return points;
    }

      generateSacksSpiral(maxNum) {
      const points = [];
      
      for (let n = 1; n <= maxNum; n++) {
        const r = Math.sqrt(n);
        const theta = 2 * Math.PI * r;
        
        const x = r * Math.cos(theta);
        const y = r * Math.sin(theta);
        
        points.push({ x, y, n });
      }
      
      return points;
    }

      generateArchimedesSpiral(maxNum) {
      const points = [];
      const a = 2; // spiral parameter
      
      for (let n = 1; n <= maxNum; n++) {
        const theta = Math.sqrt(n) * 0.5;
        const r = a * theta;
        
        const x = r * Math.cos(theta);
        const y = r * Math.sin(theta);
        
        points.push({ x, y, n });
      }
      
      return points;
    }

      // Spatial grid for efficient hover detection
      buildSpatialGrid() {
        this.spatialGrid.clear();
        const gridSize = 20; // pixels
        const { width, height } = this.resizeCanvas();
        
        this.visiblePoints = [];
        const centerX = width / 2 + this.offsetX;
        const centerY = height / 2 + this.offsetY;
        const scale = this.spiralType === 'ulam' ? 8 : 4;
        
        for (const point of this.spiralPoints) {
          const screenX = centerX + point.x * scale * this.zoom;
          const screenY = centerY + point.y * scale * this.zoom;
          
          // Only include visible points
          if (screenX >= -50 && screenX <= width + 50 && screenY >= -50 && screenY <= height + 50) {
            const gridX = Math.floor(screenX / gridSize);
            const gridY = Math.floor(screenY / gridSize);
            const gridKey = `${gridX},${gridY}`;
            
            const pointData = { ...point, screenX, screenY };
            this.visiblePoints.push(pointData);
            
            if (!this.spatialGrid.has(gridKey)) {
              this.spatialGrid.set(gridKey, []);
            }
            this.spatialGrid.get(gridKey).push(pointData);
          }
        }
      }

      generateSpiral() {
        const startTime = performance.now();
        const maxNum = parseInt(this.rangeSlider.value);
      
      // Generate primes
        this.primes = this.sieveOfEratosthenes(maxNum);
      
      // Generate spiral points
        switch (this.spiralType) {
        case 'ulam':
            this.spiralPoints = this.generateUlamSpiral(maxNum);
          break;
        case 'sacks':
            this.spiralPoints = this.generateSacksSpiral(maxNum);
          break;
        case 'archimedes':
            this.spiralPoints = this.generateArchimedesSpiral(maxNum);
          break;
      }
      
        this.buildSpatialGrid();
        this.updateStats();
        this.draw();
        
        const endTime = performance.now();
        this.performanceInfo.textContent = `Generated in ${(endTime - startTime).toFixed(1)}ms`;
      }

      updateStats() {
        const maxNum = parseInt(this.rangeSlider.value);
        const numPrimes = this.primes.size;
      const density = (numPrimes / maxNum * 100).toFixed(1);
      
        this.currentRange.textContent = `1-${maxNum.toLocaleString()}`;
        this.primeCount.textContent = numPrimes.toLocaleString();
        this.primeDensity.textContent = `${density}%`;
        this.zoomLevel.textContent = this.zoom.toFixed(1) + 'x';
      }

      updateLabels() {
        const maxNum = parseInt(this.rangeSlider.value);
        this.rangeLabel.textContent = maxNum.toLocaleString();
        this.dotSizeLabel.textContent = parseFloat(this.dotSizeSlider.value).toFixed(1) + 'px';
      }

      // Hover detection using spatial grid
      findPointAt(mouseX, mouseY) {
        const gridSize = 20;
        const gridX = Math.floor(mouseX / gridSize);
        const gridY = Math.floor(mouseY / gridSize);
        
        // Check surrounding grid cells for better detection
        for (let dx = -1; dx <= 1; dx++) {
          for (let dy = -1; dy <= 1; dy++) {
            const gridKey = `${gridX + dx},${gridY + dy}`;
            const points = this.spatialGrid.get(gridKey);
            
            if (points) {
              for (const point of points) {
                const distance = Math.sqrt(
                  Math.pow(mouseX - point.screenX, 2) + 
                  Math.pow(mouseY - point.screenY, 2)
                );
                
                const dotSize = parseFloat(this.dotSizeSlider.value);
                const hitRadius = Math.max(8, dotSize * this.zoom + 4);
                
                if (distance <= hitRadius) {
                  return point;
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
        return null;
      }

      getCoordinateInfo(point) {
        switch (this.spiralType) {
          case 'ulam':
            return `Grid: (${point.x}, ${point.y})`;
          
          case 'sacks':
            const r = Math.sqrt(point.n);
            const theta = (2 * Math.PI * r) % (2 * Math.PI);
            const degrees = (theta * 180 / Math.PI).toFixed(1);
            return `Polar: r=${r.toFixed(2)}, Î¸=${degrees}Â°`;
          
          case 'archimedes':
            const archiTheta = Math.sqrt(point.n) * 0.5;
            const archiR = 2 * archiTheta;
            const archiDegrees = (archiTheta * 180 / Math.PI).toFixed(1);
            return `Spiral: r=${archiR.toFixed(2)}, Î¸=${archiDegrees}Â°`;
          
          default:
            return `Position: (${point.x.toFixed(2)}, ${point.y.toFixed(2)})`;
        }
      }

      showTooltip(point, mouseX, mouseY) {
        if (!point) {
          this.tooltip.classList.remove('visible');
          this.canvas.classList.remove('hovering-prime');
          this.hoveredPoint = null;
          this.draw();
          return;
        }

        const isPrime = this.primes.has(point.n);
        
        // Only show tooltip and change cursor for prime numbers
        if (isPrime) {
          const coordinateInfo = this.getCoordinateInfo(point);
          
          // Create structured tooltip content
          const tooltipHTML = `
            <div class="tooltip-prime">Prime: ${point.n.toLocaleString()}</div>
            <div class="tooltip-coords">${coordinateInfo}</div>
          `;
          
          // Position tooltip relative to the canvas, not the page
          const rect = this.canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
          const canvasRelativeX = mouseX - rect.left;
          const canvasRelativeY = mouseY - rect.top;
          
          this.tooltip.innerHTML = tooltipHTML;
          this.tooltip.style.left = canvasRelativeX + 'px';
          this.tooltip.style.top = canvasRelativeY + 'px';
          this.tooltip.classList.add('visible');
          this.canvas.classList.add('hovering-prime');
          
          // Add visual highlight to the hovered point
          this.hoveredPoint = point;
          this.draw();
        } else {
          // For non-prime numbers, just clear tooltip and cursor
          this.tooltip.classList.remove('visible');
          this.canvas.classList.remove('hovering-prime');
          this.hoveredPoint = null;
          this.draw();
        }
      }

      draw() {
        const startTime = performance.now();
        const { width, height } = this.resizeCanvas();
        
        // Clear canvas with gradient background
        const gradient = this.ctx.createRadialGradient(
          width / 2, height / 2, 0,
          width / 2, height / 2, Math.max(width, height) / 2
        );
        gradient.addColorStop(0, '#0a0e1a');
        gradient.addColorStop(1, '#050810');
        this.ctx.fillStyle = gradient;
        this.ctx.fillRect(0, 0, width, height);
        
        const dotSize = parseFloat(this.dotSizeSlider.value);
        
        // Draw all numbers (faint background)
        this.ctx.fillStyle = 'rgba(150, 164, 199, 0.08)';
        for (const point of this.visiblePoints) {
          if (!this.primes.has(point.n)) {
            this.ctx.beginPath();
            this.ctx.arc(point.screenX, point.screenY, dotSize * 0.4 * this.zoom, 0, Math.PI * 2);
            this.ctx.fill();
          }
        }
        
        // Draw prime numbers (bright and colorful)
        for (const point of this.visiblePoints) {
          if (this.primes.has(point.n)) {
            // Enhanced color scheme for primes
            const logN = Math.log(point.n);
            const hue = (logN * 47 + point.n * 0.1) % 360;
            const intensity = Math.min(1, logN / 10);
            const lightness = 60 + intensity * 25;
            const saturation = 70 + intensity * 20;
            
            // Highlight hovered point
            const isHovered = this.hoveredPoint && this.hoveredPoint.n === point.n;
            const alpha = isHovered ? 1 : 0.9;
            const sizeMultiplier = isHovered ? 1.5 : 1;
            
            this.ctx.fillStyle = `hsla(${hue}, ${saturation}%, ${lightness}%, ${alpha})`;
            
            // Add glow effect for hovered point
            if (isHovered) {
              this.ctx.shadowColor = `hsl(${hue}, ${saturation}%, ${lightness}%)`;
              this.ctx.shadowBlur = 15;
            }
            
            this.ctx.beginPath();
            this.ctx.arc(
              point.screenX, 
              point.screenY, 
              dotSize * this.zoom * sizeMultiplier, 
              0, Math.PI * 2
            );
            this.ctx.fill();
            
            // Reset shadow
            this.ctx.shadowBlur = 0;
          }
        }
        
        // Draw center point for reference (only for Ulam)
        if (this.spiralType === 'ulam') {
          this.ctx.fillStyle = '#ff6b6b';
          this.ctx.shadowColor = '#ff6b6b';
          this.ctx.shadowBlur = 8;
          this.ctx.beginPath();
          this.ctx.arc(width / 2 + this.offsetX, height / 2 + this.offsetY, 3, 0, Math.PI * 2);
          this.ctx.fill();
          this.ctx.shadowBlur = 0;
        }
        
        // Performance monitoring
        this.frameCount++;
        const endTime = performance.now();
        if (this.frameCount % 60 === 0) {
          this.performanceInfo.textContent += ` | Render: ${(endTime - startTime).toFixed(1)}ms`;
        }
      }

      setSpiralType(type) {
        this.spiralType = type;
      
      // Update button states
      document.querySelectorAll('.spirals .btn').forEach(btn => {
        btn.classList.remove('active');
      });
      
        if (type === 'ulam') this.ulamBtn.classList.add('active');
        else if (type === 'sacks') this.sacksBtn.classList.add('active');
        else if (type === 'archimedes') this.archimedesBtn.classList.add('active');
        
        this.generateSpiral();
      }

      resetView() {
        this.offsetX = 0;
        this.offsetY = 0;
        this.zoom = 1;
        this.hoveredPoint = null;
        this.tooltip.classList.remove('visible');
        this.canvas.classList.remove('dragging', 'hovering-prime');
        this.buildSpatialGrid();
        this.updateStats();
        this.draw();
      }

      setupEventListeners() {
        // Mouse interaction with hover detection
        this.canvas.addEventListener('mousedown', (e) => {
          this.dragging = true;
          this.lastMouseX = e.clientX;
          this.lastMouseY = e.clientY;
          this.canvas.classList.add('dragging');
          this.canvas.classList.remove('hovering-prime');
        });

        this.canvas.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {
          const rect = this.canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
          const mouseX = e.clientX - rect.left;
          const mouseY = e.clientY - rect.top;

          if (this.dragging) {
            const deltaX = e.clientX - this.lastMouseX;
            const deltaY = e.clientY - this.lastMouseY;
            
            this.offsetX += deltaX;
            this.offsetY += deltaY;
            
            this.lastMouseX = e.clientX;
            this.lastMouseY = e.clientY;
            
            this.buildSpatialGrid();
            this.draw();
            
            // Hide tooltip while dragging
            this.tooltip.classList.remove('visible');
          } else {
            // Hover detection - pass screen coordinates for tooltip positioning
            const hoveredPoint = this.findPointAt(mouseX, mouseY);
            if (hoveredPoint !== this.hoveredPoint) {
              this.showTooltip(hoveredPoint, e.clientX, e.clientY);
            }
          }
        });

        this.canvas.addEventListener('mouseup', () => {
          this.dragging = false;
          this.canvas.classList.remove('dragging');
          // Cursor will be set by hover detection
        });

        this.canvas.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {
          this.dragging = false;
          this.canvas.classList.remove('dragging', 'hovering-prime');
          this.hoveredPoint = null;
          this.tooltip.classList.remove('visible');
          this.draw();
        });

        // Enhanced zoom with mouse wheel
        this.canvas.addEventListener('wheel', (e) => {
      e.preventDefault();
          
          const rect = this.canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
          const mouseX = e.clientX - rect.left;
          const mouseY = e.clientY - rect.top;
      
      const zoomFactor = e.deltaY > 0 ? 0.9 : 1.1;
          const newZoom = this.zoom * zoomFactor;
          
          if (newZoom >= 0.1 && newZoom <= 50) {
            // Zoom towards mouse position
            const centerX = rect.width / 2;
            const centerY = rect.height / 2;
            
            this.offsetX += (mouseX - centerX) * (1 - zoomFactor);
            this.offsetY += (mouseY - centerY) * (1 - zoomFactor);
            
            this.zoom = newZoom;
            this.buildSpatialGrid();
            this.updateStats();
            this.draw();
          }
        });

        // Control event listeners
        this.ulamBtn.addEventListener('click', () => this.setSpiralType('ulam'));
        this.sacksBtn.addEventListener('click', () => this.setSpiralType('sacks'));
        this.archimedesBtn.addEventListener('click', () => this.setSpiralType('archimedes'));
        this.generateBtn.addEventListener('click', () => this.generateSpiral());
        this.resetViewBtn.addEventListener('click', () => this.resetView());

        this.rangeSlider.addEventListener('input', () => this.updateLabels());
        this.dotSizeSlider.addEventListener('input', () => {
          this.updateLabels();
          this.draw();
        });

        this.rangeSlider.addEventListener('change', () => this.generateSpiral());

    window.addEventListener('resize', () => {
          this.buildSpatialGrid();
          this.draw();
        });
      }

      initializeView() {
        this.updateLabels();
        this.generateSpiral();
      }
    }

    // Initialize the application
    const spiralVisualizer = new PrimeSpiralVisualizer();
  </script>
</body>
</html>

  <script>
    // Enhanced Prime Spiral Visualization with hover detection
    class PrimeSpiralVisualizer {
      constructor() {
        this.initializeElements();
        this.initializeState();
        this.setupEventListeners();
        this.initializeView();
      }

      initializeElements() {
        this.canvas = document.getElementById('canvas');
        this.tooltip = document.getElementById('tooltip');
        this.performanceInfo = document.getElementById('performanceInfo');
        
        // Control elements
        this.ulamBtn = document.getElementById('ulamBtn');
        this.sacksBtn = document.getElementById('sacksBtn');
        this.archimedesBtn = document.getElementById('archimedesBtn');
        this.generateBtn = document.getElementById('generateBtn');
        this.resetViewBtn = document.getElementById('resetViewBtn');
        this.rangeSlider = document.getElementById('rangeSlider');
        this.dotSizeSlider = document.getElementById('dotSizeSlider');
        
        // Display elements
        this.rangeLabel = document.getElementById('rangeLabel');
        this.dotSizeLabel = document.getElementById('dotSizeLabel');
        this.currentRange = document.getElementById('currentRange');
        this.primeCount = document.getElementById('primeCount');
        this.primeDensity = document.getElementById('primeDensity');
        this.zoomLevel = document.getElementById('zoomLevel');
      }

      initializeState() {
        this.ctx = null;
        this.spiralType = 'ulam';
        this.primes = new Set();
        this.spiralPoints = [];
        this.visiblePoints = []; // Cache for visible points (performance optimization)
    
    // View parameters
        this.offsetX = 0;
        this.offsetY = 0;
        this.zoom = 1;
        this.dragging = false;
        this.lastMouseX = 0;
        this.lastMouseY = 0;
        
        // Performance tracking
        this.lastFrameTime = 0;
        this.frameCount = 0;
        
        // Hover detection
        this.hoveredPoint = null;
        this.spatialGrid = new Map(); // For efficient hover detection
      }

      resizeCanvas() {
      const ratio = Math.max(1, Math.floor(window.devicePixelRatio || 1));
        const rect = this.canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
        this.canvas.width = rect.width * ratio;
        this.canvas.height = rect.height * ratio;
        this.ctx = this.canvas.getContext('2d');
        this.ctx.scale(ratio, ratio);
        this.ctx.imageSmoothingEnabled = true;
        this.ctx.imageSmoothingQuality = 'high';
      return { width: rect.width, height: rect.height };
    }

      sieveOfEratosthenes(limit) {
      const sieve = new Array(limit + 1).fill(true);
      sieve[0] = sieve[1] = false;
      
      for (let i = 2; i * i <= limit; i++) {
        if (sieve[i]) {
          for (let j = i * i; j <= limit; j += i) {
            sieve[j] = false;
          }
        }
      }
      
      const primeSet = new Set();
      for (let i = 2; i <= limit; i++) {
        if (sieve[i]) primeSet.add(i);
      }
      return primeSet;
    }

      generateUlamSpiral(maxNum) {
      const points = [];
      let x = 0, y = 0;
      let dx = 0, dy = -1;
      let num = 1;
      
      for (let i = 0; i < maxNum; i++) {
        points.push({ x, y, n: num });
        
        if (x === y || (x < 0 && x === -y) || (x > 0 && x === 1 - y)) {
          [dx, dy] = [-dy, dx];
        }
        
        x += dx;
        y += dy;
        num++;
      }
      
      return points;
    }

      generateSacksSpiral(maxNum) {
      const points = [];
      
      for (let n = 1; n <= maxNum; n++) {
        const r = Math.sqrt(n);
        const theta = 2 * Math.PI * r;
        
        const x = r * Math.cos(theta);
        const y = r * Math.sin(theta);
        
        points.push({ x, y, n });
      }
      
      return points;
    }

      generateArchimedesSpiral(maxNum) {
      const points = [];
      const a = 2; // spiral parameter
      
      for (let n = 1; n <= maxNum; n++) {
        const theta = Math.sqrt(n) * 0.5;
        const r = a * theta;
        
        const x = r * Math.cos(theta);
        const y = r * Math.sin(theta);
        
        points.push({ x, y, n });
      }
      
      return points;
    }

      // Spatial grid for efficient hover detection
      buildSpatialGrid() {
        this.spatialGrid.clear();
        const gridSize = 20; // pixels
        const { width, height } = this.resizeCanvas();
        
        this.visiblePoints = [];
        const centerX = width / 2 + this.offsetX;
        const centerY = height / 2 + this.offsetY;
        const scale = this.spiralType === 'ulam' ? 8 : 4;
        
        for (const point of this.spiralPoints) {
          const screenX = centerX + point.x * scale * this.zoom;
          const screenY = centerY + point.y * scale * this.zoom;
          
          // Only include visible points
          if (screenX >= -50 && screenX <= width + 50 && screenY >= -50 && screenY <= height + 50) {
            const gridX = Math.floor(screenX / gridSize);
            const gridY = Math.floor(screenY / gridSize);
            const gridKey = `${gridX},${gridY}`;
            
            const pointData = { ...point, screenX, screenY };
            this.visiblePoints.push(pointData);
            
            if (!this.spatialGrid.has(gridKey)) {
              this.spatialGrid.set(gridKey, []);
            }
            this.spatialGrid.get(gridKey).push(pointData);
          }
        }
      }

      generateSpiral() {
        const startTime = performance.now();
        const maxNum = parseInt(this.rangeSlider.value);
      
      // Generate primes
        this.primes = this.sieveOfEratosthenes(maxNum);
      
      // Generate spiral points
        switch (this.spiralType) {
        case 'ulam':
            this.spiralPoints = this.generateUlamSpiral(maxNum);
          break;
        case 'sacks':
            this.spiralPoints = this.generateSacksSpiral(maxNum);
          break;
        case 'archimedes':
            this.spiralPoints = this.generateArchimedesSpiral(maxNum);
          break;
      }
      
        this.buildSpatialGrid();
        this.updateStats();
        this.draw();
        
        const endTime = performance.now();
        this.performanceInfo.textContent = `Generated in ${(endTime - startTime).toFixed(1)}ms`;
      }

      updateStats() {
        const maxNum = parseInt(this.rangeSlider.value);
        const numPrimes = this.primes.size;
      const density = (numPrimes / maxNum * 100).toFixed(1);
      
        this.currentRange.textContent = `1-${maxNum.toLocaleString()}`;
        this.primeCount.textContent = numPrimes.toLocaleString();
        this.primeDensity.textContent = `${density}%`;
        this.zoomLevel.textContent = this.zoom.toFixed(1) + 'x';
      }

      updateLabels() {
        const maxNum = parseInt(this.rangeSlider.value);
        this.rangeLabel.textContent = maxNum.toLocaleString();
        this.dotSizeLabel.textContent = parseFloat(this.dotSizeSlider.value).toFixed(1) + 'px';
      }

      // Hover detection using spatial grid
      findPointAt(mouseX, mouseY) {
        const gridSize = 20;
        const gridX = Math.floor(mouseX / gridSize);
        const gridY = Math.floor(mouseY / gridSize);
        
        // Check surrounding grid cells for better detection
        for (let dx = -1; dx <= 1; dx++) {
          for (let dy = -1; dy <= 1; dy++) {
            const gridKey = `${gridX + dx},${gridY + dy}`;
            const points = this.spatialGrid.get(gridKey);
            
            if (points) {
              for (const point of points) {
                const distance = Math.sqrt(
                  Math.pow(mouseX - point.screenX, 2) + 
                  Math.pow(mouseY - point.screenY, 2)
                );
                
                const dotSize = parseFloat(this.dotSizeSlider.value);
                const hitRadius = Math.max(8, dotSize * this.zoom + 4);
                
                if (distance <= hitRadius) {
                  return point;
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
        return null;
      }

      getCoordinateInfo(point) {
        switch (this.spiralType) {
          case 'ulam':
            return `Grid: (${point.x}, ${point.y})`;
          
          case 'sacks':
            const r = Math.sqrt(point.n);
            const theta = (2 * Math.PI * r) % (2 * Math.PI);
            const degrees = (theta * 180 / Math.PI).toFixed(1);
            return `Polar: r=${r.toFixed(2)}, Î¸=${degrees}Â°`;
          
          case 'archimedes':
            const archiTheta = Math.sqrt(point.n) * 0.5;
            const archiR = 2 * archiTheta;
            const archiDegrees = (archiTheta * 180 / Math.PI).toFixed(1);
            return `Spiral: r=${archiR.toFixed(2)}, Î¸=${archiDegrees}Â°`;
          
          default:
            return `Position: (${point.x.toFixed(2)}, ${point.y.toFixed(2)})`;
        }
      }

      showTooltip(point, mouseX, mouseY) {
        if (!point) {
          this.tooltip.classList.remove('visible');
          this.canvas.classList.remove('hovering-prime');
          this.hoveredPoint = null;
          this.draw();
          return;
        }

        const isPrime = this.primes.has(point.n);
        
        // Only show tooltip and change cursor for prime numbers
        if (isPrime) {
          const coordinateInfo = this.getCoordinateInfo(point);
          
          // Create structured tooltip content
          const tooltipHTML = `
            <div class="tooltip-prime">Prime: ${point.n.toLocaleString()}</div>
            <div class="tooltip-coords">${coordinateInfo}</div>
          `;
          
          // Position tooltip relative to the canvas, not the page
          const rect = this.canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
          const canvasRelativeX = mouseX - rect.left;
          const canvasRelativeY = mouseY - rect.top;
          
          this.tooltip.innerHTML = tooltipHTML;
          this.tooltip.style.left = canvasRelativeX + 'px';
          this.tooltip.style.top = canvasRelativeY + 'px';
          this.tooltip.classList.add('visible');
          this.canvas.classList.add('hovering-prime');
          
          // Add visual highlight to the hovered point
          this.hoveredPoint = point;
          this.draw();
        } else {
          // For non-prime numbers, just clear tooltip and cursor
          this.tooltip.classList.remove('visible');
          this.canvas.classList.remove('hovering-prime');
          this.hoveredPoint = null;
          this.draw();
        }
      }

      draw() {
        const startTime = performance.now();
        const { width, height } = this.resizeCanvas();
        
        // Clear canvas with gradient background
        const gradient = this.ctx.createRadialGradient(
          width / 2, height / 2, 0,
          width / 2, height / 2, Math.max(width, height) / 2
        );
        gradient.addColorStop(0, '#0a0e1a');
        gradient.addColorStop(1, '#050810');
        this.ctx.fillStyle = gradient;
        this.ctx.fillRect(0, 0, width, height);
        
        const dotSize = parseFloat(this.dotSizeSlider.value);
        
        // Draw all numbers (faint background)
        this.ctx.fillStyle = 'rgba(150, 164, 199, 0.08)';
        for (const point of this.visiblePoints) {
          if (!this.primes.has(point.n)) {
            this.ctx.beginPath();
            this.ctx.arc(point.screenX, point.screenY, dotSize * 0.4 * this.zoom, 0, Math.PI * 2);
            this.ctx.fill();
          }
        }
        
        // Draw prime numbers (bright and colorful)
        for (const point of this.visiblePoints) {
          if (this.primes.has(point.n)) {
            // Enhanced color scheme for primes
            const logN = Math.log(point.n);
            const hue = (logN * 47 + point.n * 0.1) % 360;
            const intensity = Math.min(1, logN / 10);
            const lightness = 60 + intensity * 25;
            const saturation = 70 + intensity * 20;
            
            // Highlight hovered point
            const isHovered = this.hoveredPoint && this.hoveredPoint.n === point.n;
            const alpha = isHovered ? 1 : 0.9;
            const sizeMultiplier = isHovered ? 1.5 : 1;
            
            this.ctx.fillStyle = `hsla(${hue}, ${saturation}%, ${lightness}%, ${alpha})`;
            
            // Add glow effect for hovered point
            if (isHovered) {
              this.ctx.shadowColor = `hsl(${hue}, ${saturation}%, ${lightness}%)`;
              this.ctx.shadowBlur = 15;
            }
            
            this.ctx.beginPath();
            this.ctx.arc(
              point.screenX, 
              point.screenY, 
              dotSize * this.zoom * sizeMultiplier, 
              0, Math.PI * 2
            );
            this.ctx.fill();
            
            // Reset shadow
            this.ctx.shadowBlur = 0;
          }
        }
        
        // Draw center point for reference (only for Ulam)
        if (this.spiralType === 'ulam') {
          this.ctx.fillStyle = '#ff6b6b';
          this.ctx.shadowColor = '#ff6b6b';
          this.ctx.shadowBlur = 8;
          this.ctx.beginPath();
          this.ctx.arc(width / 2 + this.offsetX, height / 2 + this.offsetY, 3, 0, Math.PI * 2);
          this.ctx.fill();
          this.ctx.shadowBlur = 0;
        }
        
        // Performance monitoring
        this.frameCount++;
        const endTime = performance.now();
        if (this.frameCount % 60 === 0) {
          this.performanceInfo.textContent += ` | Render: ${(endTime - startTime).toFixed(1)}ms`;
        }
      }

      setSpiralType(type) {
        this.spiralType = type;
      
      // Update button states
      document.querySelectorAll('.spirals .btn').forEach(btn => {
        btn.classList.remove('active');
      });
      
        if (type === 'ulam') this.ulamBtn.classList.add('active');
        else if (type === 'sacks') this.sacksBtn.classList.add('active');
        else if (type === 'archimedes') this.archimedesBtn.classList.add('active');
        
        this.generateSpiral();
      }

      resetView() {
        this.offsetX = 0;
        this.offsetY = 0;
        this.zoom = 1;
        this.hoveredPoint = null;
        this.tooltip.classList.remove('visible');
        this.canvas.classList.remove('dragging', 'hovering-prime');
        this.buildSpatialGrid();
        this.updateStats();
        this.draw();
      }

      setupEventListeners() {
        // Mouse interaction with hover detection
        this.canvas.addEventListener('mousedown', (e) => {
          this.dragging = true;
          this.lastMouseX = e.clientX;
          this.lastMouseY = e.clientY;
          this.canvas.classList.add('dragging');
          this.canvas.classList.remove('hovering-prime');
        });

        this.canvas.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {
          const rect = this.canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
          const mouseX = e.clientX - rect.left;
          const mouseY = e.clientY - rect.top;

          if (this.dragging) {
            const deltaX = e.clientX - this.lastMouseX;
            const deltaY = e.clientY - this.lastMouseY;
            
            this.offsetX += deltaX;
            this.offsetY += deltaY;
            
            this.lastMouseX = e.clientX;
            this.lastMouseY = e.clientY;
            
            this.buildSpatialGrid();
            this.draw();
            
            // Hide tooltip while dragging
            this.tooltip.classList.remove('visible');
          } else {
            // Hover detection - pass screen coordinates for tooltip positioning
            const hoveredPoint = this.findPointAt(mouseX, mouseY);
            if (hoveredPoint !== this.hoveredPoint) {
              this.showTooltip(hoveredPoint, e.clientX, e.clientY);
            }
          }
        });

        this.canvas.addEventListener('mouseup', () => {
          this.dragging = false;
          this.canvas.classList.remove('dragging');
          // Cursor will be set by hover detection
        });

        this.canvas.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {
          this.dragging = false;
          this.canvas.classList.remove('dragging', 'hovering-prime');
          this.hoveredPoint = null;
          this.tooltip.classList.remove('visible');
          this.draw();
        });

        // Enhanced zoom with mouse wheel
        this.canvas.addEventListener('wheel', (e) => {
      e.preventDefault();
          
          const rect = this.canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
          const mouseX = e.clientX - rect.left;
          const mouseY = e.clientY - rect.top;
      
      const zoomFactor = e.deltaY > 0 ? 0.9 : 1.1;
          const newZoom = this.zoom * zoomFactor;
          
          if (newZoom >= 0.1 && newZoom <= 50) {
            // Zoom towards mouse position
            const centerX = rect.width / 2;
            const centerY = rect.height / 2;
            
            this.offsetX += (mouseX - centerX) * (1 - zoomFactor);
            this.offsetY += (mouseY - centerY) * (1 - zoomFactor);
            
            this.zoom = newZoom;
            this.buildSpatialGrid();
            this.updateStats();
            this.draw();
          }
        });

        // Control event listeners
        this.ulamBtn.addEventListener('click', () => this.setSpiralType('ulam'));
        this.sacksBtn.addEventListener('click', () => this.setSpiralType('sacks'));
        this.archimedesBtn.addEventListener('click', () => this.setSpiralType('archimedes'));
        this.generateBtn.addEventListener('click', () => this.generateSpiral());
        this.resetViewBtn.addEventListener('click', () => this.resetView());

        this.rangeSlider.addEventListener('input', () => this.updateLabels());
        this.dotSizeSlider.addEventListener('input', () => {
          this.updateLabels();
          this.draw();
        });

        this.rangeSlider.addEventListener('change', () => this.generateSpiral());

    window.addEventListener('resize', () => {
          this.buildSpatialGrid();
          this.draw();
        });
      }

      initializeView() {
        this.updateLabels();
        this.generateSpiral();
      }
    }

    // Initialize the application
    const spiralVisualizer = new PrimeSpiralVisualizer();
  </script>
</body>
</html>

  <script>
    // Enhanced Prime Spiral Visualization with hover detection
    class PrimeSpiralVisualizer {
      constructor() {
        this.initializeElements();
        this.initializeState();
        this.setupEventListeners();
        this.initializeView();
      }

      initializeElements() {
        this.canvas = document.getElementById('canvas');
        this.tooltip = document.getElementById('tooltip');
        this.performanceInfo = document.getElementById('performanceInfo');
        
        // Control elements
        this.ulamBtn = document.getElementById('ulamBtn');
        this.sacksBtn = document.getElementById('sacksBtn');
        this.archimedesBtn = document.getElementById('archimedesBtn');
        this.generateBtn = document.getElementById('generateBtn');
        this.resetViewBtn = document.getElementById('resetViewBtn');
        this.rangeSlider = document.getElementById('rangeSlider');
        this.dotSizeSlider = document.getElementById('dotSizeSlider');
        
        // Display elements
        this.rangeLabel = document.getElementById('rangeLabel');
        this.dotSizeLabel = document.getElementById('dotSizeLabel');
        this.currentRange = document.getElementById('currentRange');
        this.primeCount = document.getElementById('primeCount');
        this.primeDensity = document.getElementById('primeDensity');
        this.zoomLevel = document.getElementById('zoomLevel');
      }

      initializeState() {
        this.ctx = null;
        this.spiralType = 'ulam';
        this.primes = new Set();
        this.spiralPoints = [];
        this.visiblePoints = []; // Cache for visible points (performance optimization)
    
    // View parameters
        this.offsetX = 0;
        this.offsetY = 0;
        this.zoom = 1;
        this.dragging = false;
        this.lastMouseX = 0;
        this.lastMouseY = 0;
        
        // Performance tracking
        this.lastFrameTime = 0;
        this.frameCount = 0;
        
        // Hover detection
        this.hoveredPoint = null;
        this.spatialGrid = new Map(); // For efficient hover detection
      }

      resizeCanvas() {
      const ratio = Math.max(1, Math.floor(window.devicePixelRatio || 1));
        const rect = this.canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
        this.canvas.width = rect.width * ratio;
        this.canvas.height = rect.height * ratio;
        this.ctx = this.canvas.getContext('2d');
        this.ctx.scale(ratio, ratio);
        this.ctx.imageSmoothingEnabled = true;
        this.ctx.imageSmoothingQuality = 'high';
      return { width: rect.width, height: rect.height };
    }

      sieveOfEratosthenes(limit) {
      const sieve = new Array(limit + 1).fill(true);
      sieve[0] = sieve[1] = false;
      
      for (let i = 2; i * i <= limit; i++) {
        if (sieve[i]) {
          for (let j = i * i; j <= limit; j += i) {
            sieve[j] = false;
          }
        }
      }
      
      const primeSet = new Set();
      for (let i = 2; i <= limit; i++) {
        if (sieve[i]) primeSet.add(i);
      }
      return primeSet;
    }

      generateUlamSpiral(maxNum) {
      const points = [];
      let x = 0, y = 0;
      let dx = 0, dy = -1;
      let num = 1;
      
      for (let i = 0; i < maxNum; i++) {
        points.push({ x, y, n: num });
        
        if (x === y || (x < 0 && x === -y) || (x > 0 && x === 1 - y)) {
          [dx, dy] = [-dy, dx];
        }
        
        x += dx;
        y += dy;
        num++;
      }
      
      return points;
    }

      generateSacksSpiral(maxNum) {
      const points = [];
      
      for (let n = 1; n <= maxNum; n++) {
        const r = Math.sqrt(n);
        const theta = 2 * Math.PI * r;
        
        const x = r * Math.cos(theta);
        const y = r * Math.sin(theta);
        
        points.push({ x, y, n });
      }
      
      return points;
    }

      generateArchimedesSpiral(maxNum) {
      const points = [];
      const a = 2; // spiral parameter
      
      for (let n = 1; n <= maxNum; n++) {
        const theta = Math.sqrt(n) * 0.5;
        const r = a * theta;
        
        const x = r * Math.cos(theta);
        const y = r * Math.sin(theta);
        
        points.push({ x, y, n });
      }
      
      return points;
    }

      // Spatial grid for efficient hover detection
      buildSpatialGrid() {
        this.spatialGrid.clear();
        const gridSize = 20; // pixels
        const { width, height } = this.resizeCanvas();
        
        this.visiblePoints = [];
        const centerX = width / 2 + this.offsetX;
        const centerY = height / 2 + this.offsetY;
        const scale = this.spiralType === 'ulam' ? 8 : 4;
        
        for (const point of this.spiralPoints) {
          const screenX = centerX + point.x * scale * this.zoom;
          const screenY = centerY + point.y * scale * this.zoom;
          
          // Only include visible points
          if (screenX >= -50 && screenX <= width + 50 && screenY >= -50 && screenY <= height + 50) {
            const gridX = Math.floor(screenX / gridSize);
            const gridY = Math.floor(screenY / gridSize);
            const gridKey = `${gridX},${gridY}`;
            
            const pointData = { ...point, screenX, screenY };
            this.visiblePoints.push(pointData);
            
            if (!this.spatialGrid.has(gridKey)) {
              this.spatialGrid.set(gridKey, []);
            }
            this.spatialGrid.get(gridKey).push(pointData);
          }
        }
      }

      generateSpiral() {
        const startTime = performance.now();
        const maxNum = parseInt(this.rangeSlider.value);
      
      // Generate primes
        this.primes = this.sieveOfEratosthenes(maxNum);
      
      // Generate spiral points
        switch (this.spiralType) {
        case 'ulam':
            this.spiralPoints = this.generateUlamSpiral(maxNum);
          break;
        case 'sacks':
            this.spiralPoints = this.generateSacksSpiral(maxNum);
          break;
        case 'archimedes':
            this.spiralPoints = this.generateArchimedesSpiral(maxNum);
          break;
      }
      
        this.buildSpatialGrid();
        this.updateStats();
        this.draw();
        
        const endTime = performance.now();
        this.performanceInfo.textContent = `Generated in ${(endTime - startTime).toFixed(1)}ms`;
      }

      updateStats() {
        const maxNum = parseInt(this.rangeSlider.value);
        const numPrimes = this.primes.size;
      const density = (numPrimes / maxNum * 100).toFixed(1);
      
        this.currentRange.textContent = `1-${maxNum.toLocaleString()}`;
        this.primeCount.textContent = numPrimes.toLocaleString();
        this.primeDensity.textContent = `${density}%`;
        this.zoomLevel.textContent = this.zoom.toFixed(1) + 'x';
      }

      updateLabels() {
        const maxNum = parseInt(this.rangeSlider.value);
        this.rangeLabel.textContent = maxNum.toLocaleString();
        this.dotSizeLabel.textContent = parseFloat(this.dotSizeSlider.value).toFixed(1) + 'px';
      }

      // Hover detection using spatial grid
      findPointAt(mouseX, mouseY) {
        const gridSize = 20;
        const gridX = Math.floor(mouseX / gridSize);
        const gridY = Math.floor(mouseY / gridSize);
        
        // Check surrounding grid cells for better detection
        for (let dx = -1; dx <= 1; dx++) {
          for (let dy = -1; dy <= 1; dy++) {
            const gridKey = `${gridX + dx},${gridY + dy}`;
            const points = this.spatialGrid.get(gridKey);
            
            if (points) {
              for (const point of points) {
                const distance = Math.sqrt(
                  Math.pow(mouseX - point.screenX, 2) + 
                  Math.pow(mouseY - point.screenY, 2)
                );
                
                const dotSize = parseFloat(this.dotSizeSlider.value);
                const hitRadius = Math.max(8, dotSize * this.zoom + 4);
                
                if (distance <= hitRadius) {
                  return point;
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
        return null;
      }

      getCoordinateInfo(point) {
        switch (this.spiralType) {
          case 'ulam':
            return `Grid: (${point.x}, ${point.y})`;
          
          case 'sacks':
            const r = Math.sqrt(point.n);
            const theta = (2 * Math.PI * r) % (2 * Math.PI);
            const degrees = (theta * 180 / Math.PI).toFixed(1);
            return `Polar: r=${r.toFixed(2)}, Î¸=${degrees}Â°`;
          
          case 'archimedes':
            const archiTheta = Math.sqrt(point.n) * 0.5;
            const archiR = 2 * archiTheta;
            const archiDegrees = (archiTheta * 180 / Math.PI).toFixed(1);
            return `Spiral: r=${archiR.toFixed(2)}, Î¸=${archiDegrees}Â°`;
          
          default:
            return `Position: (${point.x.toFixed(2)}, ${point.y.toFixed(2)})`;
        }
      }

      showTooltip(point, mouseX, mouseY) {
        if (!point) {
          this.tooltip.classList.remove('visible');
          this.canvas.classList.remove('hovering-prime');
          this.hoveredPoint = null;
          this.draw();
          return;
        }

        const isPrime = this.primes.has(point.n);
        
        // Only show tooltip and change cursor for prime numbers
        if (isPrime) {
          const coordinateInfo = this.getCoordinateInfo(point);
          
          // Create structured tooltip content
          const tooltipHTML = `
            <div class="tooltip-prime">Prime: ${point.n.toLocaleString()}</div>
            <div class="tooltip-coords">${coordinateInfo}</div>
          `;
          
          // Position tooltip relative to the canvas, not the page
          const rect = this.canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
          const canvasRelativeX = mouseX - rect.left;
          const canvasRelativeY = mouseY - rect.top;
          
          this.tooltip.innerHTML = tooltipHTML;
          this.tooltip.style.left = canvasRelativeX + 'px';
          this.tooltip.style.top = canvasRelativeY + 'px';
          this.tooltip.classList.add('visible');
          this.canvas.classList.add('hovering-prime');
          
          // Add visual highlight to the hovered point
          this.hoveredPoint = point;
          this.draw();
        } else {
          // For non-prime numbers, just clear tooltip and cursor
          this.tooltip.classList.remove('visible');
          this.canvas.classList.remove('hovering-prime');
          this.hoveredPoint = null;
          this.draw();
        }
      }

      draw() {
        const startTime = performance.now();
        const { width, height } = this.resizeCanvas();
        
        // Clear canvas with gradient background
        const gradient = this.ctx.createRadialGradient(
          width / 2, height / 2, 0,
          width / 2, height / 2, Math.max(width, height) / 2
        );
        gradient.addColorStop(0, '#0a0e1a');
        gradient.addColorStop(1, '#050810');
        this.ctx.fillStyle = gradient;
        this.ctx.fillRect(0, 0, width, height);
        
        const dotSize = parseFloat(this.dotSizeSlider.value);
        
        // Draw all numbers (faint background)
        this.ctx.fillStyle = 'rgba(150, 164, 199, 0.08)';
        for (const point of this.visiblePoints) {
          if (!this.primes.has(point.n)) {
            this.ctx.beginPath();
            this.ctx.arc(point.screenX, point.screenY, dotSize * 0.4 * this.zoom, 0, Math.PI * 2);
            this.ctx.fill();
          }
        }
        
        // Draw prime numbers (bright and colorful)
        for (const point of this.visiblePoints) {
          if (this.primes.has(point.n)) {
            // Enhanced color scheme for primes
            const logN = Math.log(point.n);
            const hue = (logN * 47 + point.n * 0.1) % 360;
            const intensity = Math.min(1, logN / 10);
            const lightness = 60 + intensity * 25;
            const saturation = 70 + intensity * 20;
            
            // Highlight hovered point
            const isHovered = this.hoveredPoint && this.hoveredPoint.n === point.n;
            const alpha = isHovered ? 1 : 0.9;
            const sizeMultiplier = isHovered ? 1.5 : 1;
            
            this.ctx.fillStyle = `hsla(${hue}, ${saturation}%, ${lightness}%, ${alpha})`;
            
            // Add glow effect for hovered point
            if (isHovered) {
              this.ctx.shadowColor = `hsl(${hue}, ${saturation}%, ${lightness}%)`;
              this.ctx.shadowBlur = 15;
            }
            
            this.ctx.beginPath();
            this.ctx.arc(
              point.screenX, 
              point.screenY, 
              dotSize * this.zoom * sizeMultiplier, 
              0, Math.PI * 2
            );
            this.ctx.fill();
            
            // Reset shadow
            this.ctx.shadowBlur = 0;
          }
        }
        
        // Draw center point for reference (only for Ulam)
        if (this.spiralType === 'ulam') {
          this.ctx.fillStyle = '#ff6b6b';
          this.ctx.shadowColor = '#ff6b6b';
          this.ctx.shadowBlur = 8;
          this.ctx.beginPath();
          this.ctx.arc(width / 2 + this.offsetX, height / 2 + this.offsetY, 3, 0, Math.PI * 2);
          this.ctx.fill();
          this.ctx.shadowBlur = 0;
        }
        
        // Performance monitoring
        this.frameCount++;
        const endTime = performance.now();
        if (this.frameCount % 60 === 0) {
          this.performanceInfo.textContent += ` | Render: ${(endTime - startTime).toFixed(1)}ms`;
        }
      }

      setSpiralType(type) {
        this.spiralType = type;
      
      // Update button states
      document.querySelectorAll('.spirals .btn').forEach(btn => {
        btn.classList.remove('active');
      });
      
        if (type === 'ulam') this.ulamBtn.classList.add('active');
        else if (type === 'sacks') this.sacksBtn.classList.add('active');
        else if (type === 'archimedes') this.archimedesBtn.classList.add('active');
        
        this.generateSpiral();
      }

      resetView() {
        this.offsetX = 0;
        this.offsetY = 0;
        this.zoom = 1;
        this.hoveredPoint = null;
        this.tooltip.classList.remove('visible');
        this.canvas.classList.remove('dragging', 'hovering-prime');
        this.buildSpatialGrid();
        this.updateStats();
        this.draw();
      }

      setupEventListeners() {
        // Mouse interaction with hover detection
        this.canvas.addEventListener('mousedown', (e) => {
          this.dragging = true;
          this.lastMouseX = e.clientX;
          this.lastMouseY = e.clientY;
          this.canvas.classList.add('dragging');
          this.canvas.classList.remove('hovering-prime');
        });

        this.canvas.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {
          const rect = this.canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
          const mouseX = e.clientX - rect.left;
          const mouseY = e.clientY - rect.top;

          if (this.dragging) {
            const deltaX = e.clientX - this.lastMouseX;
            const deltaY = e.clientY - this.lastMouseY;
            
            this.offsetX += deltaX;
            this.offsetY += deltaY;
            
            this.lastMouseX = e.clientX;
            this.lastMouseY = e.clientY;
            
            this.buildSpatialGrid();
            this.draw();
            
            // Hide tooltip while dragging
            this.tooltip.classList.remove('visible');
          } else {
            // Hover detection - pass screen coordinates for tooltip positioning
            const hoveredPoint = this.findPointAt(mouseX, mouseY);
            if (hoveredPoint !== this.hoveredPoint) {
              this.showTooltip(hoveredPoint, e.clientX, e.clientY);
            }
          }
        });

        this.canvas.addEventListener('mouseup', () => {
          this.dragging = false;
          this.canvas.classList.remove('dragging');
          // Cursor will be set by hover detection
        });

        this.canvas.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {
          this.dragging = false;
          this.canvas.classList.remove('dragging', 'hovering-prime');
          this.hoveredPoint = null;
          this.tooltip.classList.remove('visible');
          this.draw();
        });

        // Enhanced zoom with mouse wheel
        this.canvas.addEventListener('wheel', (e) => {
      e.preventDefault();
          
          const rect = this.canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
          const mouseX = e.clientX - rect.left;
          const mouseY = e.clientY - rect.top;
      
      const zoomFactor = e.deltaY > 0 ? 0.9 : 1.1;
          const newZoom = this.zoom * zoomFactor;
          
          if (newZoom >= 0.1 && newZoom <= 50) {
            // Zoom towards mouse position
            const centerX = rect.width / 2;
            const centerY = rect.height / 2;
            
            this.offsetX += (mouseX - centerX) * (1 - zoomFactor);
            this.offsetY += (mouseY - centerY) * (1 - zoomFactor);
            
            this.zoom = newZoom;
            this.buildSpatialGrid();
            this.updateStats();
            this.draw();
          }
        });

        // Control event listeners
        this.ulamBtn.addEventListener('click', () => this.setSpiralType('ulam'));
        this.sacksBtn.addEventListener('click', () => this.setSpiralType('sacks'));
        this.archimedesBtn.addEventListener('click', () => this.setSpiralType('archimedes'));
        this.generateBtn.addEventListener('click', () => this.generateSpiral());
        this.resetViewBtn.addEventListener('click', () => this.resetView());

        this.rangeSlider.addEventListener('input', () => this.updateLabels());
        this.dotSizeSlider.addEventListener('input', () => {
          this.updateLabels();
          this.draw();
        });

        this.rangeSlider.addEventListener('change', () => this.generateSpiral());

    window.addEventListener('resize', () => {
          this.buildSpatialGrid();
          this.draw();
        });
      }

      initializeView() {
        this.updateLabels();
        this.generateSpiral();
      }
    }

    // Initialize the application
    const spiralVisualizer = new PrimeSpiralVisualizer();
  </script>
</body>
</html>

  <script>
    // Enhanced Prime Spiral Visualization with hover detection
    class PrimeSpiralVisualizer {
      constructor() {
        this.initializeElements();
        this.initializeState();
        this.setupEventListeners();
        this.initializeView();
      }

      initializeElements() {
        this.canvas = document.getElementById('canvas');
        this.tooltip = document.getElementById('tooltip');
        this.performanceInfo = document.getElementById('performanceInfo');
        
        // Control elements
        this.ulamBtn = document.getElementById('ulamBtn');
        this.sacksBtn = document.getElementById('sacksBtn');
        this.archimedesBtn = document.getElementById('archimedesBtn');
        this.generateBtn = document.getElementById('generateBtn');
        this.resetViewBtn = document.getElementById('resetViewBtn');
        this.rangeSlider = document.getElementById('rangeSlider');
        this.dotSizeSlider = document.getElementById('dotSizeSlider');
        
        // Display elements
        this.rangeLabel = document.getElementById('rangeLabel');
        this.dotSizeLabel = document.getElementById('dotSizeLabel');
        this.currentRange = document.getElementById('currentRange');
        this.primeCount = document.getElementById('primeCount');
        this.primeDensity = document.getElementById('primeDensity');
        this.zoomLevel = document.getElementById('zoomLevel');
      }

      initializeState() {
        this.ctx = null;
        this.spiralType = 'ulam';
        this.primes = new Set();
        this.spiralPoints = [];
        this.visiblePoints = []; // Cache for visible points (performance optimization)
    
    // View parameters
        this.offsetX = 0;
        this.offsetY = 0;
        this.zoom = 1;
        this.dragging = false;
        this.lastMouseX = 0;
        this.lastMouseY = 0;
        
        // Performance tracking
        this.lastFrameTime = 0;
        this.frameCount = 0;
        
        // Hover detection
        this.hoveredPoint = null;
        this.spatialGrid = new Map(); // For efficient hover detection
      }

      resizeCanvas() {
      const ratio = Math.max(1, Math.floor(window.devicePixelRatio || 1));
        const rect = this.canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
        this.canvas.width = rect.width * ratio;
        this.canvas.height = rect.height * ratio;
        this.ctx = this.canvas.getContext('2d');
        this.ctx.scale(ratio, ratio);
        this.ctx.imageSmoothingEnabled = true;
        this.ctx.imageSmoothingQuality = 'high';
      return { width: rect.width, height: rect.height };
    }

      sieveOfEratosthenes(limit) {
      const sieve = new Array(limit + 1).fill(true);
      sieve[0] = sieve[1] = false;
      
      for (let i = 2; i * i <= limit; i++) {
        if (sieve[i]) {
          for (let j = i * i; j <= limit; j += i) {
            sieve[j] = false;
          }
        }
      }
      
      const primeSet = new Set();
      for (let i = 2; i <= limit; i++) {
        if (sieve[i]) primeSet.add(i);
      }
      return primeSet;
    }

      generateUlamSpiral(maxNum) {
      const points = [];
      let x = 0, y = 0;
      let dx = 0, dy = -1;
      let num = 1;
      
      for (let i = 0; i < maxNum; i++) {
        points.push({ x, y, n: num });
        
        if (x === y || (x < 0 && x === -y) || (x > 0 && x === 1 - y)) {
          [dx, dy] = [-dy, dx];
        }
        
        x += dx;
        y += dy;
        num++;
      }
      
      return points;
    }

      generateSacksSpiral(maxNum) {
      const points = [];
      
      for (let n = 1; n <= maxNum; n++) {
        const r = Math.sqrt(n);
        const theta = 2 * Math.PI * r;
        
        const x = r * Math.cos(theta);
        const y = r * Math.sin(theta);
        
        points.push({ x, y, n });
      }
      
      return points;
    }

      generateArchimedesSpiral(maxNum) {
      const points = [];
      const a = 2; // spiral parameter
      
      for (let n = 1; n <= maxNum; n++) {
        const theta = Math.sqrt(n) * 0.5;
        const r = a * theta;
        
        const x = r * Math.cos(theta);
        const y = r * Math.sin(theta);
        
        points.push({ x, y, n });
      }
      
      return points;
    }

      // Spatial grid for efficient hover detection
      buildSpatialGrid() {
        this.spatialGrid.clear();
        const gridSize = 20; // pixels
        const { width, height } = this.resizeCanvas();
        
        this.visiblePoints = [];
        const centerX = width / 2 + this.offsetX;
        const centerY = height / 2 + this.offsetY;
        const scale = this.spiralType === 'ulam' ? 8 : 4;
        
        for (const point of this.spiralPoints) {
          const screenX = centerX + point.x * scale * this.zoom;
          const screenY = centerY + point.y * scale * this.zoom;
          
          // Only include visible points
          if (screenX >= -50 && screenX <= width + 50 && screenY >= -50 && screenY <= height + 50) {
            const gridX = Math.floor(screenX / gridSize);
            const gridY = Math.floor(screenY / gridSize);
            const gridKey = `${gridX},${gridY}`;
            
            const pointData = { ...point, screenX, screenY };
            this.visiblePoints.push(pointData);
            
            if (!this.spatialGrid.has(gridKey)) {
              this.spatialGrid.set(gridKey, []);
            }
            this.spatialGrid.get(gridKey).push(pointData);
          }
        }
      }

      generateSpiral() {
        const startTime = performance.now();
        const maxNum = parseInt(this.rangeSlider.value);
      
      // Generate primes
        this.primes = this.sieveOfEratosthenes(maxNum);
      
      // Generate spiral points
        switch (this.spiralType) {
        case 'ulam':
            this.spiralPoints = this.generateUlamSpiral(maxNum);
          break;
        case 'sacks':
            this.spiralPoints = this.generateSacksSpiral(maxNum);
          break;
        case 'archimedes':
            this.spiralPoints = this.generateArchimedesSpiral(maxNum);
          break;
      }
      
        this.buildSpatialGrid();
        this.updateStats();
        this.draw();
        
        const endTime = performance.now();
        this.performanceInfo.textContent = `Generated in ${(endTime - startTime).toFixed(1)}ms`;
      }

      updateStats() {
        const maxNum = parseInt(this.rangeSlider.value);
        const numPrimes = this.primes.size;
      const density = (numPrimes / maxNum * 100).toFixed(1);
      
        this.currentRange.textContent = `1-${maxNum.toLocaleString()}`;
        this.primeCount.textContent = numPrimes.toLocaleString();
        this.primeDensity.textContent = `${density}%`;
        this.zoomLevel.textContent = this.zoom.toFixed(1) + 'x';
      }

      updateLabels() {
        const maxNum = parseInt(this.rangeSlider.value);
        this.rangeLabel.textContent = maxNum.toLocaleString();
        this.dotSizeLabel.textContent = parseFloat(this.dotSizeSlider.value).toFixed(1) + 'px';
      }

      // Hover detection using spatial grid
      findPointAt(mouseX, mouseY) {
        const gridSize = 20;
        const gridX = Math.floor(mouseX / gridSize);
        const gridY = Math.floor(mouseY / gridSize);
        
        // Check surrounding grid cells for better detection
        for (let dx = -1; dx <= 1; dx++) {
          for (let dy = -1; dy <= 1; dy++) {
            const gridKey = `${gridX + dx},${gridY + dy}`;
            const points = this.spatialGrid.get(gridKey);
            
            if (points) {
              for (const point of points) {
                const distance = Math.sqrt(
                  Math.pow(mouseX - point.screenX, 2) + 
                  Math.pow(mouseY - point.screenY, 2)
                );
                
                const dotSize = parseFloat(this.dotSizeSlider.value);
                const hitRadius = Math.max(8, dotSize * this.zoom + 4);
                
                if (distance <= hitRadius) {
                  return point;
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
        return null;
      }

      getCoordinateInfo(point) {
        switch (this.spiralType) {
          case 'ulam':
            return `Grid: (${point.x}, ${point.y})`;
          
          case 'sacks':
            const r = Math.sqrt(point.n);
            const theta = (2 * Math.PI * r) % (2 * Math.PI);
            const degrees = (theta * 180 / Math.PI).toFixed(1);
            return `Polar: r=${r.toFixed(2)}, Î¸=${degrees}Â°`;
          
          case 'archimedes':
            const archiTheta = Math.sqrt(point.n) * 0.5;
            const archiR = 2 * archiTheta;
            const archiDegrees = (archiTheta * 180 / Math.PI).toFixed(1);
            return `Spiral: r=${archiR.toFixed(2)}, Î¸=${archiDegrees}Â°`;
          
          default:
            return `Position: (${point.x.toFixed(2)}, ${point.y.toFixed(2)})`;
        }
      }

      showTooltip(point, mouseX, mouseY) {
        if (!point) {
          this.tooltip.classList.remove('visible');
          this.canvas.classList.remove('hovering-prime');
          this.hoveredPoint = null;
          this.draw();
          return;
        }

        const isPrime = this.primes.has(point.n);
        
        // Only show tooltip and change cursor for prime numbers
        if (isPrime) {
          const coordinateInfo = this.getCoordinateInfo(point);
          
          // Create structured tooltip content
          const tooltipHTML = `
            <div class="tooltip-prime">Prime: ${point.n.toLocaleString()}</div>
            <div class="tooltip-coords">${coordinateInfo}</div>
          `;
          
          // Position tooltip relative to the canvas, not the page
          const rect = this.canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
          const canvasRelativeX = mouseX - rect.left;
          const canvasRelativeY = mouseY - rect.top;
          
          this.tooltip.innerHTML = tooltipHTML;
          this.tooltip.style.left = canvasRelativeX + 'px';
          this.tooltip.style.top = canvasRelativeY + 'px';
          this.tooltip.classList.add('visible');
          this.canvas.classList.add('hovering-prime');
          
          // Add visual highlight to the hovered point
          this.hoveredPoint = point;
          this.draw();
        } else {
          // For non-prime numbers, just clear tooltip and cursor
          this.tooltip.classList.remove('visible');
          this.canvas.classList.remove('hovering-prime');
          this.hoveredPoint = null;
          this.draw();
        }
      }

      draw() {
        const startTime = performance.now();
        const { width, height } = this.resizeCanvas();
        
        // Clear canvas with gradient background
        const gradient = this.ctx.createRadialGradient(
          width / 2, height / 2, 0,
          width / 2, height / 2, Math.max(width, height) / 2
        );
        gradient.addColorStop(0, '#0a0e1a');
        gradient.addColorStop(1, '#050810');
        this.ctx.fillStyle = gradient;
        this.ctx.fillRect(0, 0, width, height);
        
        const dotSize = parseFloat(this.dotSizeSlider.value);
        
        // Draw all numbers (faint background)
        this.ctx.fillStyle = 'rgba(150, 164, 199, 0.08)';
        for (const point of this.visiblePoints) {
          if (!this.primes.has(point.n)) {
            this.ctx.beginPath();
            this.ctx.arc(point.screenX, point.screenY, dotSize * 0.4 * this.zoom, 0, Math.PI * 2);
            this.ctx.fill();
          }
        }
        
        // Draw prime numbers (bright and colorful)
        for (const point of this.visiblePoints) {
          if (this.primes.has(point.n)) {
            // Enhanced color scheme for primes
            const logN = Math.log(point.n);
            const hue = (logN * 47 + point.n * 0.1) % 360;
            const intensity = Math.min(1, logN / 10);
            const lightness = 60 + intensity * 25;
            const saturation = 70 + intensity * 20;
            
            // Highlight hovered point
            const isHovered = this.hoveredPoint && this.hoveredPoint.n === point.n;
            const alpha = isHovered ? 1 : 0.9;
            const sizeMultiplier = isHovered ? 1.5 : 1;
            
            this.ctx.fillStyle = `hsla(${hue}, ${saturation}%, ${lightness}%, ${alpha})`;
            
            // Add glow effect for hovered point
            if (isHovered) {
              this.ctx.shadowColor = `hsl(${hue}, ${saturation}%, ${lightness}%)`;
              this.ctx.shadowBlur = 15;
            }
            
            this.ctx.beginPath();
            this.ctx.arc(
              point.screenX, 
              point.screenY, 
              dotSize * this.zoom * sizeMultiplier, 
              0, Math.PI * 2
            );
            this.ctx.fill();
            
            // Reset shadow
            this.ctx.shadowBlur = 0;
          }
        }
        
        // Draw center point for reference (only for Ulam)
        if (this.spiralType === 'ulam') {
          this.ctx.fillStyle = '#ff6b6b';
          this.ctx.shadowColor = '#ff6b6b';
          this.ctx.shadowBlur = 8;
          this.ctx.beginPath();
          this.ctx.arc(width / 2 + this.offsetX, height / 2 + this.offsetY, 3, 0, Math.PI * 2);
          this.ctx.fill();
          this.ctx.shadowBlur = 0;
        }
        
        // Performance monitoring
        this.frameCount++;
        const endTime = performance.now();
        if (this.frameCount % 60 === 0) {
          this.performanceInfo.textContent += ` | Render: ${(endTime - startTime).toFixed(1)}ms`;
        }
      }

      setSpiralType(type) {
        this.spiralType = type;
      
      // Update button states
      document.querySelectorAll('.spirals .btn').forEach(btn => {
        btn.classList.remove('active');
      });
      
        if (type === 'ulam') this.ulamBtn.classList.add('active');
        else if (type === 'sacks') this.sacksBtn.classList.add('active');
        else if (type === 'archimedes') this.archimedesBtn.classList.add('active');
        
        this.generateSpiral();
      }

      resetView() {
        this.offsetX = 0;
        this.offsetY = 0;
        this.zoom = 1;
        this.hoveredPoint = null;
        this.tooltip.classList.remove('visible');
        this.canvas.classList.remove('dragging', 'hovering-prime');
        this.buildSpatialGrid();
        this.updateStats();
        this.draw();
      }

      setupEventListeners() {
        // Mouse interaction with hover detection
        this.canvas.addEventListener('mousedown', (e) => {
          this.dragging = true;
          this.lastMouseX = e.clientX;
          this.lastMouseY = e.clientY;
          this.canvas.classList.add('dragging');
          this.canvas.classList.remove('hovering-prime');
        });

        this.canvas.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {
          const rect = this.canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
          const mouseX = e.clientX - rect.left;
          const mouseY = e.clientY - rect.top;

          if (this.dragging) {
            const deltaX = e.clientX - this.lastMouseX;
            const deltaY = e.clientY - this.lastMouseY;
            
            this.offsetX += deltaX;
            this.offsetY += deltaY;
            
            this.lastMouseX = e.clientX;
            this.lastMouseY = e.clientY;
            
            this.buildSpatialGrid();
            this.draw();
            
            // Hide tooltip while dragging
            this.tooltip.classList.remove('visible');
          } else {
            // Hover detection - pass screen coordinates for tooltip positioning
            const hoveredPoint = this.findPointAt(mouseX, mouseY);
            if (hoveredPoint !== this.hoveredPoint) {
              this.showTooltip(hoveredPoint, e.clientX, e.clientY);
            }
          }
        });

        this.canvas.addEventListener('mouseup', () => {
          this.dragging = false;
          this.canvas.classList.remove('dragging');
          // Cursor will be set by hover detection
        });

        this.canvas.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {
          this.dragging = false;
          this.canvas.classList.remove('dragging', 'hovering-prime');
          this.hoveredPoint = null;
          this.tooltip.classList.remove('visible');
          this.draw();
        });

        // Enhanced zoom with mouse wheel
        this.canvas.addEventListener('wheel', (e) => {
      e.preventDefault();
          
          const rect = this.canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
          const mouseX = e.clientX - rect.left;
          const mouseY = e.clientY - rect.top;
      
      const zoomFactor = e.deltaY > 0 ? 0.9 : 1.1;
          const newZoom = this.zoom * zoomFactor;
          
          if (newZoom >= 0.1 && newZoom <= 50) {
            // Zoom towards mouse position
            const centerX = rect.width / 2;
            const centerY = rect.height / 2;
            
            this.offsetX += (mouseX - centerX) * (1 - zoomFactor);
            this.offsetY += (mouseY - centerY) * (1 - zoomFactor);
            
            this.zoom = newZoom;
            this.buildSpatialGrid();
            this.updateStats();
            this.draw();
          }
        });

        // Control event listeners
        this.ulamBtn.addEventListener('click', () => this.setSpiralType('ulam'));
        this.sacksBtn.addEventListener('click', () => this.setSpiralType('sacks'));
        this.archimedesBtn.addEventListener('click', () => this.setSpiralType('archimedes'));
        this.generateBtn.addEventListener('click', () => this.generateSpiral());
        this.resetViewBtn.addEventListener('click', () => this.resetView());

        this.rangeSlider.addEventListener('input', () => this.updateLabels());
        this.dotSizeSlider.addEventListener('input', () => {
          this.updateLabels();
          this.draw();
        });

        this.rangeSlider.addEventListener('change', () => this.generateSpiral());

    window.addEventListener('resize', () => {
          this.buildSpatialGrid();
          this.draw();
        });
      }

      initializeView() {
        this.updateLabels();
        this.generateSpiral();
      }
    }

    // Initialize the application
    const spiralVisualizer = new PrimeSpiralVisualizer();
  </script>
</body>
